Contributors

Steven Bancarz

Ex-New Ager. YouTuber. Exposing the New Age movement

http://reasonsforjesus.com
Norman Geisler

Norman Leo Geisler is a Christian systematic theologian and philosopher. He is the co-founder of two non-denominational Evangelical seminaries.

http://normangeisler.com
Ravi Zacharias

an Indian-born Canadian-American Christian apologist. A defender of traditional evangelicalism. Zacharias is the author of numerous Christian books, including the Gold Medallion Book Award winner Can Man Live Without God? in the category "theology and doctrine" and Christian bestsellers Light in the Shadow of Jihad[4] and The Grand Weaver.

https://rzim.org
Dr Michael Brown

A conservative radio host, author, professor and a noted proponent of Messianic Judaism and serves as a leader of the Charismatic Movement.

https://askdrbrown.org
